abstract: Beholder, in first Grade 1 race victory for a mare, wins by eight and a quarter lengths in $1 million Pacific Classic in Del Mar, Calif, earning automatic berth in Breeders' Cup Classic.
lead_paragraph: Beholder, the 2-1 favorite, ran one and a quarter miles in 1 minute 59.77 seconds and earned an automatic berth in the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic.
snippet: Beholder, the 2-1 favorite, ran one and a quarter miles in 1 minute 59.77 seconds and earned an automatic berth in the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic.
